name: Spell Bane
text: While your bane weapon is active, creatures that your bane affects find it more difficult to resist your spells.
benefit: While your bane class feature is affecting a creature type, the saving throw’s DCs for your spells increase by +2 for creatures of that type.
text_zh: 当你的破敌武器启动时，破敌对象生物更难抵抗你的法术。
benefit_zh: 当你的【破敌】职业特性正在对某一类型的生物生效时，该类型生物抵抗你的法术的豁免DC上升2点。
